00046 
00047 Entree& Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF::readOn(Entree& is )
00048 {
00049   int i,compteur = 0;
00050   Motcle motlu;
00051   Cerr << "         ######### Warning ! #########" << finl;
00052   Cerr << " For the moment, this forcing term is only available" << finl;
00053   Cerr << "     for recovering identical solid meshes." << finl;
00054   Cerr << " If otherwise, it will produce a beautiful core-dump..." << finl;
00055 
00056   for(i=0 ; i<3 ; i++)
00057     {
00058       is >> motlu;
00059 
00060       if(motlu == "TAU")
00061         {
00062           compteur++;
00063           is >> tau;
00064           if(tau==0)
00065             {
00066               Cerr << "TAU can not be equal to 0." << finl;
00067               exit();
00068             }
00069           Cerr << "Characteristic time TAU is : " << tau << finl;
00070         }
00071       else if(motlu == "pb_swift")
00072         {
00073           compteur++;
00074           Nom swift;
00075           is >> swift;
00076           pb_swift=ref_cast(Probleme_base, Interprete::objet(swift));
00077           Cerr << "pb_swift is: " << pb_swift.le_nom() << finl;
00078         }
00079       else if(motlu == "pb_corse")
00080         {
00081           compteur++;
00082           Nom corse;
00083           is >> corse;
00084           pb_corse=ref_cast(Probleme_base, Interprete::objet(corse));
00085           Cerr << "pb_coarse is: " << pb_corse.le_nom() << finl;
00086         }
00087       else
00088         {
00089           Cerr << "An argument of Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF is not correct !" << finl;
00090           exit();
00091         }
00092     }
00093   if(compteur != 3)
00094     {
00095       Cerr << "The forcing term for the mean solid temperature field with the SWIFT method needs 3 arguments" << finl;
00096       Cerr << "Syntax : " << finl;
00097       Cerr << "Solide_SWIFT SWIFT pb_sol_SWIFT COARSE pb_sol_coarse TAU tau " << finl;
00098       exit();
00099     }
00100 
00101 
00102 // On recupere les equations de conduction des deux domaines (SWIFT et grossier)
00103   int flag=0;
00104   for(i=0; i<pb_swift->nombre_d_equations(); i++)
00105     {
00106       if(sub_type(Conduction,pb_swift->equation(i)))
00107         {
00108           eq_swift = ref_cast(Conduction,pb_swift->equation(i));
00109           flag=1;
00110         }
00111     }
00112   if (flag==0)
00113     {
00114       Cerr << "Error : The Conduction equation was not found...!" << finl;
00115       Cerr << "for the SWIFT solid forcing term (in pb_swift)." << finl;
00116       exit();
00117     }
00118 
00119   flag=0;
00120   for(i=0; i<pb_corse->nombre_d_equations(); i++)
00121     {
00122       if(sub_type(Conduction,pb_corse->equation(i)))
00123         {
00124           eq_corse = ref_cast(Conduction,pb_corse->equation(i));
00125           flag=1;
00126         }
00127     }
00128   if (flag==0)
00129     {
00130       Cerr << "Error : The Conduction equation was not found...!" << finl;
00131       Cerr << "for the SWIFT solid forcing term (in pb_coarse)." << finl;
00132       exit();
00133     }
00134 
00135   init_calcul_moyenne(eq_swift.valeur(),Y_swift,corresp_swift,compt_swift);
00136   init_calcul_moyenne(eq_corse.valeur(),Y_corse,corresp_corse,compt_corse);
00137 
00138 // Calcul du tableau de correspondance entre un element de Tmoy_swift et l'element de Tmoy_corse correspondant
00139 // pour calculer le terme de forcage.
00140   correspondance_SWIFT_coarse();
00141 
00142   return is;
00143 
00144 }

00172 
00173 void Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF::init_calcul_moyenne(const Conduction& my_eqn, DoubleVect& Y, IntVect& corresp, IntVect& compt)
00174 {
00175   int num_elem,j,indic,trouve;
00176   double y;
00177 
00178   const Zone_dis_base& zdisbase = my_eqn.inconnue().zone_dis_base();
00179   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF      = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, zdisbase);
00180   const DoubleTab& xp           = zone_VDF.xp();
00181 
00182   int nb_elems   = zone_VDF.zone().nb_elem();
00183   int nb_faces_x = zone_VDF.nb_faces_X();
00184   int nb_faces_z = zone_VDF.nb_faces_Z();
00185 
00186   int Nx        = nb_elems/(nb_faces_x-nb_elems);
00187   int Nz        = nb_elems/(nb_faces_z-nb_elems);
00188   int Ny        = nb_elems/Nx/Nz;
00189 
00190   Y.resize(Ny);
00191   compt.resize(Ny);
00192   corresp.resize(nb_elems);
00193 
00194   Y = -100.;
00195   compt = 0;
00196   corresp = -1;
00197 
00198   j=0;
00199   indic = 0;
00200   for (num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elems; num_elem++)
00201     {
00202       y = xp(num_elem,1);
00203       trouve = 0;
00204       for (j=0; j<indic+1; j++)
00205         {
00206           if(dabs(y-Y[j])<=1e-8)
00207             {
00208               corresp[num_elem] = j;
00209               compt[j] ++;
00210               j=indic+1;
00211               trouve = 1;
00212               break;
00213             }
00214         }
00215       if (trouve==0)
00216         {
00217           corresp[num_elem] = indic;
00218           Y[indic]=y;
00219           compt[indic] ++;
00220           indic++;
00221         }
00222     }
00223 }

00233 
00234 void Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF::correspondance_SWIFT_coarse( )
00235 {
00236   int t_S = Y_swift.size();
00237   int t_C = Y_corse.size();
00238   corresp_SC.resize(t_S);
00239 
00240   for(int j=0; j<t_S; j++)
00241     {
00242       int burk=1;
00243       for(int i=0; i<t_C; i++)
00244         {
00245           if(dabs(Y_swift[j]-Y_corse[i])<=1e-8)
00246             {
00247               burk=0;
00248               corresp_SC[j]=i;
00249             }
00250         }
00251       if(burk)
00252         {
00253           Cerr << "## ACHTUNG !!! On n'a pas trouve l'equivalence entre" << finl;
00254           Cerr << "## les deux domaines au niveau des Y !" << finl;
00255         }
00256     }
00257 }

00267 
00268 void Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF::calcul_moyenne(const Conduction& my_eqn, DoubleVect& T_moy, const IntVect& corresp, const IntVect& compt) const
00269 {
00270   const Zone_dis_base& zdisbase = my_eqn.inconnue().zone_dis_base();
00271   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF      = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, zdisbase);
00272   const DoubleTab& Temp         = my_eqn.inconnue().valeurs();
00273 
00274   int nb_elems   = zone_VDF.zone().nb_elem();
00275   int nb_faces_x = zone_VDF.nb_faces_X();
00276   int nb_faces_z = zone_VDF.nb_faces_Z();
00277 
00278   int Nx        = nb_elems/(nb_faces_x-nb_elems);
00279   int Nz        = nb_elems/(nb_faces_z-nb_elems);
00280   int Ny        = nb_elems/Nx/Nz;
00281 
00282 
00283   int j=0;
00284   T_moy.resize(Ny);
00285   T_moy = 0.;
00286 
00287   for (j=0; j<nb_elems; j++)  T_moy[corresp[j]] += Temp[j];
00288   for (j=0; j<Ny; j++)  T_moy[j] /= compt[j];
00289 }

00299 
00300 DoubleTab& Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const
00301 {
00302 
00303   const Zone_dis_base& zdisbase = eq_swift->inconnue().zone_dis_base();
00304   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF      = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, zdisbase);
00305   int nb_elems                   = zone_VDF.nb_elem();
00306   const DoubleVect& volume         = zone_VDF.volumes();
00307 
00308   DoubleVect Tmoy_swift;        //!< Profils de temperature moyenne.
00309   DoubleVect Tmoy_corse;
00310 
00311   /*  const Champ_base& rho_don = pb_swift->milieu().masse_volumique();
00312       const Champ_Don& Cp_don  = pb_swift->milieu().capacite_calorifique();
00313       double rho=1.,Cp=1.;
00314 
00315       if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,rho_don.valeur()))  rho = rho_don(0,0);
00316       else
00317       {
00318       Cerr << "### Rho is not uniform in the solid !" << finl;
00319       Cerr << "### Problem in Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF..." << finl;
00320       exit();
00321       }
00322 
00323       if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,Cp_don.valeur()))  Cp = Cp_don(0,0);
00324       else
00325       {
00326       Cerr << "### Cp is not uniform in the solid !" << finl;
00327       Cerr << "### Problem in Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF..." << finl;
00328       exit();
00329       }
00330       Cerr << "Rho = " << rho << finl;
00331       Cerr << "Cp = " << Cp << finl; */
00332 
00333 
00334 // On calcule les profils de temperature moyenne dans les deux solides.
00335   calcul_moyenne(eq_swift.valeur(),Tmoy_swift,corresp_swift,compt_swift);
00336   calcul_moyenne(eq_corse.valeur(),Tmoy_corse,corresp_corse,compt_corse);
00337 
00338   for(int num_elem = 0 ; num_elem<nb_elems ; num_elem++)
00339     {
00340       resu(num_elem) += volume(num_elem)*(Tmoy_corse(corresp_SC[corresp_swift[num_elem]])-Tmoy_swift(corresp_swift[num_elem]))/tau;
00341     }
00342 
00343   return resu;
00344 }

00352 
00353 DoubleTab& Terme_Source_Solide_SWIFT_VDF::calculer(DoubleTab& resu) const
00354 {
00355   resu = 0;
00356   return ajouter(resu);
00357 }
